summary: This dagger is inspired by the Cyrodilic Steel Dagger from TES:IV.  Like the rest of my releases, the dagger is very high quality with 2048x2048 textures and a low-mid poly model.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/100553141/Cyrodilic%20Steel%20Dagger/Pres---Trans.png[/img][/center]
[heading][size=5][font=georgia,serif]Cyrodilic Steel Dagger[/font][/size][/heading]
This dagger is inspired by the Cyrodilic Steel Dagger from TES:IV. After the Oblivion crisis had ended, and with it the 3rd Era, blacksmiths found new and more cost-effective ways of creating steel daggers. And so, the iconic Cyrodilic Steel Dagger, was no longer to be found at regular blacksmiths forges. The dagger itself did not entirely disappear though, rather, it became somewhat of a higher standard weapon, commonly carried by high-ranking individuals. And that\'s how it appeared in Skyrim. Eorlund Graymane has recently come by a recipe for this iconic dagger, and it is now yours to craft!
 
[heading][size=5][font=georgia,serif]Details:[/font][/size][/heading]
The Cyrodilic Steel Dagger
This is somewhat of a small release from me. The dagger itself is something that kept me occupied while I wasn\'t doing school-work or hanging out with my friends. Like the rest of my releases, the dagger is very high quality with 2048x2048 textures and a low-mid poly model. I tried making this somewhat dirtier and grittier than my past weapons, so that it was easier to implement into lore. But, if you feel like it looks to extreme for Skyrim, try to imagine that TES:IV was running on CryEnginge 3 :wink:
 
The Dagger can only be crafted at the skyforge, under the steel-section. It is slightly weaker than the daedric dagger.
So what are you waiting for? Get in game!
 
[heading][size=5][font=georgia,serif]Installation:[/font][/size][/heading]
To find out how to install or uninstall \"Cyrodilic Steel Dagger\", a simple google search for mod installation will do the trick. I do not
include instructions here to maintain a \"small\" mod description. Sorry for the inconvenience.
 
[i]I suggest looking at Gophers videos on youtube.[/i]
 
[heading][size=5][font=georgia,serif]Changelog:[/font][/size][/heading]
09.29.2013 - Ver 1.0 - Initial Release

[heading][size=5][font=georgia,serif]Licensing/Legal[/font][/size][/heading]
You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod.
Do not re-host this file on another website.
 
[heading][size=5][font=georgia,serif]Modders Will[/font][/size][/heading]
If I for some reason disappear from the nexus, either through a ban or other reasons, I request that all my content on this website gets removed. This is to assure me full control over my own content.
 
 
[center][size=5][b]Thanks for downloading :D[/b][/size][/center]
author: Elvarheim
